Traits.Name: Blood Scent
Traits.Description: Has hatred of the closest bloody foe and ignores blinded and stealth against them.

Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Description: Before the Ghul makes any attack against a foe with vigor, it can activate Life Drain. The Ghul gains vigor 1, then that character must save or lose all vigor. It fails the save if it's bloodied.
